glossary.Description: Persuasive messages used to sell products or ideas.
The process of associating a product or service with a company, value or idea.
Factual descriptions of events. It can be subjective or it can have balanced viewpoints.
The group of people or companies who put out messages using different media forms.
The form used for transmitting messages.
The singular form of "media". This term usually describes individual forms such as radio, television, film etc.
A large picture that is used to advertise something.
The process of creating media messages.
Communication of specific values and beliefs.
The owner of the magazine, newspaper or publishing company.
